description:
Over 3425 students have already enrolled!

Updated On: June, 2015

This is a course which includes an AMAZING 100 Page Blogging blueprint, and 4 step by step videos in which you will learn exactly how to create a blog from scratch, and make sales from it.

The class is most suited for total beginners who are new to building blogs.

Your class project will be to create a a blog, drive traffic to it, and make sales.

Because I am fully aware that one of the biggest problems that beginners encounter when they try to make money online is "Information Overload" I have kept each video only a few minutes long, so you will not be overwhelmed by information.

In this training you will discover exactly how to:

1. How To FIND The Perfect Niche For Your blog

2. How To CHOOSE The Best Domain Name.

3. How To CREATE Your Blog.

4. How To DESIGN Your Blog.

5. How To BUILD A Mailing List.

6. How To INSTALL A Theme For Your Blog.

7. How To CLEAN Your Blog.

8. How To WRITE The Perfect Headlines For Your Posts.

9. How To WRITE Outstanding Blog Posts.

10. How To DRIVE Traffic To Your Blog, And Make Money From Your Blog
title: Blogs in Plain English - How To Make Passive Income Blogging
